article_metadata.news-keywords: Dr. Ben Carson, NCGOP, Republicans, Raleigh, Sunday, God, Ted Cruz, Scott Walker
article_metadata.description: Tea Party hero and Presidential candidate Ben Carson invoked God, faith and courage as the fixed points of his moral compass Sunday, culminating a three-day long Republican state convention in Raleigh.
article_metadata.title: Dr. Ben Carson fires up GOP faithful in Raleigh | News & Observer
